title: Correction: Highly Nonrandom Features of Synaptic Connectivity in Local Cortical Circuits
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 3, issue 3: DOI: 10.1371/journal.pbio.0030068

In the caption for Figure 5A, the formula for the lognormal fit was given as follows:

.

The second squaring exponent should have been inside the parentheses, so it reads as follows:
